chart_description: This chart displays the count of processes in different states on the system.

dimension_descriptions.running: Number of processes actively running on the system.
dimension_descriptions.sleeping_interruptible: Number of processes waiting for an event to complete, but can be interrupted by signals.
dimension_descriptions.sleeping_uninterruptible: Number of processes waiting for an event to complete and cannot be interrupted by signals.
dimension_descriptions.zombie: Number of zombie processes, which are processes that have completed execution but are still in the process table until their parent process reads their status.
